abstract: An updated request for an automatic reload payment.
overview:
## Discussion

Provide this object to update the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/automaticReloadPaymentRequest] value in the original [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest], if necessary, after the user updated the coupon code.

# newAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest

**Instance Property**

An updated request for an automatic reload payment.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest newAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest;
```

## Discussion

Provide this object to update the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/automaticReloadPaymentRequest] value in the original [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest], if necessary, after the user updated the coupon code.
title: newAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest
